api_list.api_description: Estimate the age for a batch of names.

required_parameters.name: names
required_parameters.description: A list of first names (up to 10) to estimate ages for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: The country code to improve estimation accuracy across all names.

query: I have a list of names: John, Sarah, and Raj. Can you estimate the ages for all of them?
